I have been a CS:GOer since the game came out and overall playing Counter Strike since the very first old pixelated version and until today, it remains my most favorite game. :)

Counter Strike is a game that infuriates me but leaves me with a sense of emptiness and void when i don't play it. It is Insane how mad this game has made me and how I still like it. I Highly Recommend this!
